title: Albany International Announces Earnings Release Date
text:
ROCHESTER, N.H.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Albany International Corp. (NYSE:AIN) will release 2018 first-quarter financial results after the close of the market on Monday, May 7, 2018. The Company will host a webcast to discuss earnings at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time on Tuesday, May 8.
Interested parties are invited to listen to the webcast via the Companyâ€™s Investor Relations website at www.albint.com . A replay of the webcast will be available on the website at approximately noon Eastern Time on May 8.
About Albany International Corp.
Albany International Corp. is a global advanced textiles and materials processing company, with two core businesses. Machine Clothing is the world's leading producer of custom-designed fabrics and belts essential to production in the paper, nonwovens, and other process industries. Albany Engineered Composites is a rapidly growing supplier of highly engineered composite parts for the aerospace industry. Albany International is headquartered in Rochester, New Hampshire, operates 23 plants in 10 countries, employs 4,400 people worldwide, and is listed on the New York Stock Exchange (Symbol AIN). Additional information about the Company and its products and services can be found at www.albint.com .
